classroom.name: classroom
classroom.description: You're in a lecture hall, for some reason.

exits.description: A door leads into the hall.

hallway.name: hallway
hallway.description: This is a hallway with many locked doors.

exits.description: A door with the words STAIRS is stuck open.
A door with a crooked janitors sign is locked

Principles Office.name: Principles Office
Principles Office.description: The drawers and shelves are overflowing with loose papers and confiscated objectes

exits.description: If always wondered what the bottom of a desk looked like.
This reminds me of trips to the office, lets leave.

Under Principle's desk.name: Under Principle's desk
Under Principle's desk.description: A small red button is tucked in the back corner.

exits.description: Let's get out from under here, it smells like old sandwiches and dirty socks!

Janitor closet.name: Janitor closet
Janitor closet.description: There are many wierd items scattered around.

exits.description: There are scratch marks on the wall.
Nevermind; go back to the hallway.
I smell something funky through here
A door at the bottom of the stairs has a red, glowing, EXIT sign.

Cafeteria.name: Cafeteria
Cafeteria.description: Moldy food is strewn across the ground

exits.description: Is that a dead rat!! I gotta go!
